Quotes from Programmers (and other influencers in Computer Science)

Author: Kyle Mishanec.

This API consists of a database of quotes from famous programmers. There are 2 tables. Table 1 is to lookup an author by name and print their Wikipedia link as well as the number of quotes they have in the database. Table 2 is to list all the quotes from an author in the database.

I have also implemented error checking. If an author is not found in the API's database, it will display an error. Try it out!

API: https://programming-quotes-api.herokuapp.com/index.html

Table 1: Search for author information. Uses GET request to endpoint "/Authors/{author}"

Tips: The search is CASE SENSITIVE. "Grace hopper" will not return information for "Grace Hopper"

Try: Grace Hopper, Bill Gates, Elon Musk, Linus Torvalds

Author Wikipedia Link Quote Count (in API database)

Table 2: List all quotes from a given author in the database. Uses GET request to endpoint "/Quotes/author/{author}"

Tips: The search is CASE SENSITIVE. "Grace hopper" will not return information for "Grace Hopper"

Try: Grace Hopper, Bill Gates, Elon Musk, Linus Torvalds

Author Quote Database ID
